Appointments

Gibbs Farm is a private property, open monthly by prior appointment only to artists, educational institutions, charities and the public.

There is no fee for visiting Gibbs Farm.

These visitor dates over the coming months are:

• Thursday, 23rd February 2017 (10 a.m.-2 p.m.) — FULLY BOOKED
• Thursday, 23rd March 2017 (10 a.m.-2 p.m.) — FULLY BOOKED
• Thursday, 27th April 2017 (10 a.m.-2 p.m.) — FULLY BOOKED

If you wish to visit Gibbs Farm on one of these days please fill out the booking form. We will then contact you by email to confirm your visit. Please note that you require your email confirmation to gain access on the day.

Please read our terms of access. And view driving directions to the farm.

Please note, Gibbs Farm is not open on weekends, public or school holidays and visitor numbers are limited.

Read the FAQs

 

If your group is greater than 10, please provide further detail i.e. family group, friends, club or organisation (including name of organisation, club and transport details).
